title: Founding Titan Transformation| Eren vs Ymir | Attack on titan Season 4 /#shorts #aot

subtasks: Positioning myself on the tractor
Engaging the clutch or transmission
Adjusting throttle or speed control
Steering the tractor using the steering wheel or levers
Overcoming soil resistance while moving
Aligning the splitter with the rock
Initiating the splitting process by depressing the lever
Monitoring the split to determine if additional pressure is needed
Deploying the splitting mechanism to disengage the rock
Maneuvering the rock to a堆放position
Repositioning the tractor for the next split
Repeating the splitting cycle as necessary
